entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MDT Friday 17 March 2023
